SongRequest.title: SongRequest
SongRequest.description: Represents a song request submitted by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the song request, automatically generated by Firestore.

firstName.description: The first name of the requester.

lastName.description: The last name of the requester.

songUrl.description: URL to the karaoke video for the song.

status.description: The current status of the request.

timestamp.description: The server timestamp of when the request was submitted.

/song_requests/{songRequestId}.description: Stores all song requests. Open for reads and writes for simplicity in this demo version.
